entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 8:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: SW 33 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
